name: Angry Sun
description: throw stuff at the sun, stay alive, and make the sun run into something you built, to get points. Try not to get hit by the sun or fall out of the world.aim at a box or garbage bin and left click to pick it up then left click again to throw it. aim at the ground and left click to dig and get materials then when you have materials right click to build something. press f to switch between fast mode and normal mode.
